lead_paragraph: Bahrain said on Saturday it had uncovered a 54-member Iranian-linked militant group suspected of involvement in attacks on security forces, including organising a prison break in January, and seized automatic weapons.

headline.main: Capello Not Surprised by Conte's Chelsea Success
